Menu Design and Costing

This module is designed to enable students to create menu from a management point of view as well as marketing point of view. They are exposed to the methods to calculate menu costing, selling price and profitability, but also to the usage of design tool to create menu layout. They experience creating a menu layout from the drafting phase, to the selection of artistic direction and printing

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Review characteristics of successful menu design.

+  Calculate estimate and real cost food cost and total cost.

+  Calculate selling price for profitability optimization.

+  Plan and monitor the selling of food and beverage items.

+  Design advanced menu layout. with software design.

+  Suggest artistic direction for menu based on restaurant concept and marketing principles.
